summary: Provides a command‑line utility that loads automatic‑speech‑recognition datasets from HuggingFace, optionally authenticates, preprocesses the audio into .wav files, and generates NeMo‑compatible JSON manifests, supporting both offline (fast, high‑storage) and streaming (slower, low‑storage) processing modes.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to quickly convert public HuggingFace speech datasets into the NeMo format required for training and evaluating speech‑recognition models, reducing manual data preparation effort.
